reviewText: quick delivery good movie for kids

Ours kids (5 and 7) really like this movie. It isn't scary at all and the English dubbing doesn't bother them at all - they couldn't even tell. Netflix used to have it in English and it suddenly turned to German?? so we are now looking for a cheap English version.
Terrible.  Need a videographer  to get the timing right.  Ugh.  Suffered though half of this with the kids before throwing in the towel.
Nice movie the kids liked it! :)
Rented it for my young grandson. Kinda cute but too long. German kids movie dubbed over in English.

MY granddaughters loved this movie. I found it difficult to watch at times as the dubbing did not match very well, but it did not seem to bother them They are six and three years of age, so the story was acceptable for their age range.
This is a cheap version of Casper look alike per say.  I do not recommend this.  Our girls disliked too (4 and 5 yr old).

I had never heard of this movie, until it was mentioned in a newsletter from a homeschool blogger.  Our family is a HUGE, and I mean HUGE movie buff.  So, I ordered this for my kids, so that I could watch it with them.  It was a great family movie, and I am glad that I purchased it.
My 5 year old loved this movie.
What a great Halloween Movie. Perfect for all ages

Cannot give even 1 star, as I did not receive the product that I ordered.  Product info says it's in German.  It is not.  I do not recommend risking ordering this product if you want the German soundtrack.  IF you want English only, enjoy it.  It's a cute movie.

The story is absolutely cute! I loved the book when I was little and read it in German. but I'm really disappointed because I bought this movie expecting a movie in German language. When we got it we realized it was in English and there was no option to switch the language either.
I hope Amazon can modify the product description
